subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Olympic Games (2006)
lead_paragraph: On Sunday, the fearless Lindsey Kildow exacted a measure of revenge by winning a World Cup super-G race on the same Italian slope where her Olympic dreams were dashed a year ago.
snippet: On Sunday, the fearless Lindsey Kildow exacted a measure of revenge by winning a World Cup super-G race on the same Italian slope where her Olympic dreams were dashed a year ago.
